title: Group By Default View
content: I'm using Thunderbird 114.0b6 (64-bit). I sort and group by date. In the previous version of Thunderbird the default view of collapsed view remained after changing folders. It no longer stays collapsed. When I collapse the views in the Inbox, switch to another folder, then switch back, the view is expanded again. How do I keep the view from expanding keeping views in collapsed mode; keeping it collapsed every time I switch to another folder and return.
creator: sitesvisited

title: Can't access my email.  Anyone who send me an email gets an error message. Please help.
content: The email server stopped working on June 3. Please help.
